Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-lad
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: Unīharūlā'ī jāḍō ra garmīkō samayamā yātrāsam̐ga paricita garā'unakō lāgi
Ataḥ unīharūlā'ī āvaśyaka cha ki yasai gharakō rabakō pūjā garun
Ataḥ jasalē unīharūlā'ī bhōkamā khānā khuvāyō ra ḍara ra bhayabāṭa amana caina pradāna garyō
